entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries this evening. Clearing after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 6 April 2023
